parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the new resource group.

>  You can use resource groups to manage resources owned by your Alibaba Cloud account. Resource groups simplify the resource and permission management of your Alibaba Cloud account. For more information, see [What is resource management?](~~94475~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region to which the resource belongs.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC peering connection.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **PeerConnection**, which specifies a VPC peering connection.
